description: A complex and ingenious young woman with utter contempt for humans, Yatouji Satsuki has a love for the digital world instead. She has the ability to interact with computers through cables inserted into her body, and is able to hack into any technological system. She learned she was one of the Dragons of Earth, and was provided by Kanoe with a massive supercomputer named the Beast, through which she can physically control cables across Tokyo, using them for reconnaissance or for offensive purposes.
name: Yatouji Satsuki
